comment: Isn't a Braggot a malted beverage whereas 51%  or greater of fermentables come from the honey and less than 49% are from Malts?

Yes you are correct, however honey has a much higher concentration of sugar per pound than Maris Otter. This is why the weights look off. In this recipe 51%-54% of the ferment-able sugars are from honey (depending on the honey and calculator used). This recipe was good and I would do it again with a hop change to something else like maybe Amarillo.
